name: zooi
description:
CONTROLS: mouse or keyboard (check settings!)

GOAL: collect squares and avoid circles... how far can you get?

zooi is my fifth game for jams so far, but the first game i did fully on code! (i usually make my games on construct). zooi was made using p5js! during only 2 days :P

i made a lot of mistakes while making this game, which was great, because i learned a lot :D i still have a long way to go, but making games is fun and i am glad i made it here and didn't give up x.x

(yes, i know the music can get pretty repetitive, that's why you can mute it! i am only a beginner at music making so bear with me here, i am still working on it >_<)

thank you for reading, i hope this silly game is a bit enjoyable! comment your record >:9 mine is 1160km

by the way, the name of the game and the goal of the game are both references c;
